Mod.name: Copi's Twitchy Lua
Mod.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/5aDRWYk.png[/img]
[HR][/HR] Run code straight from twitch chat! In real time, within the safe API, this mod allows you to run code.
As twitch has bad formatting, you must write your code on one single line, but fear not! In Lua, you can separate lines with a semicolon (;)
Messages starting with [code]LUA: [/code] will be treated like code, with the [code]LUA: [/code] bit removed. Example code: [code]LUA: ThisIsAFunction(2, 5);IAmAFunctionOnAnotherLine() --this is line 2;[/code]
[u][b][i]Attributions and Thanks[/i][/b][/u] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/vdslns/]Dextercd[/url] [list][*]Lots of technical assistance and big brain Lua stuff.[/list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198095307975/]NathanSkimScam[/url] [list][*]Presenting a solution to the mod's biggest flaw[/list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198165288511/myworkshopfiles/]Horscht[/url] [list][*]Pointing me to a function which made detecting errors easy.[/list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/bruham/]Bruham[/url] [list][*]Inspiring the mod, and modding tricks used in prior versions of the mod[/list] [/list]
[u][b][i]Mod Settings[/i][/b][/u] [list] [*]Power User [list][*]Unless pandemonium is enabled, only the Power User many run code.[/list] [list][*]Must match the twitch username of the user.[/list] [*]Pandemonium [list][*]Allows anyone to run code.[/list] [list][*]EXTREMELY dangerous. Use with care.[/list] [/list]
[u][b][i]Warnings[/i][/b][/u] Even I don't know the full extent of this mod's capabilities, and I take no responsibility for any damages done with it. I will try to make settings to disable high risk code run by users, but it's up to you to moderate who gets to use it. I will be working on a 'deny/allow' list feature to replace powerusers in the future.
